chibi.menu.title: Chibi Settings
chibi.option.sync_attack.tooltip: During server lag, the cooldown also lags.
chibi.option.combat.warning: Some multiplayer servers may consider combat mods as an unfair advantage. Use them at your own risk.
chibi.warn.combat.line1: Combat mods have direct access to the game,
chibi.warn.combat.line2: and can expose or take advantage of hidden
chibi.warn.combat.line4: are two of such mods, even if sneakily.
chibi.warn.generic.dont_cheat: In doubt, ask your favorite server's moderators.
